buildings.name: Mine
buildings.description: Excavate ore from the depths. Miners extract raw materials for smithing.

tiers.flavorText: Refined minerals form a tough barrier.
Your skin becomes like living stone.
Dragonite scales form when near death.
Fortune smiles on those who dig deep.
Strike gold with every critical blow.
The mother lode empowers your crits.
Unyielding determination in the face of death.
At full strength, strike with mountain might.
Strike with the weight of ore.
